page.title: 12RELIGION
page.content: {CHURCH LINKS} IN OUR CHURCH OF ENGLAND SCHOOL THERE ARE 97 JUNIORS. LINKED WITH OUR SCHOOL ARE: 11 BROWNIES, 3 GUIDES, 14 CUBS, 3 SCOUTS, 13 EXPLORERS. 5 ATTEND FAMILY SERVICE ONCE A MONTH. ALSO 7 GO TO A SYNAGOGUE, 7 GO TO OTHER CHURCHES. {EXPLORERS} EXPLORERS IS FROM 11-12AM ON A SUNDAY AND INCLUDES HYMNS, PRAYERS AND ACTIVITIES SUCH AS MAKING MODELS OR PUPPETS AND ACTING PLAYS. ALSO THERE IS A HOLIDAY CLUB. {SYNAGOGUE AT THE PROGRESSIVE SYNAGOGUE BOYS AND GIRLS, MEN AND WOMEN SIT TOGETHER. THERE IS MAINLY READING FROM THE SCRIPTURES IN HEBREW AND ENGLISH AND PRAYERS. THE SERVICE LASTS ONE HOUR.
